v.v: “Sing, you barren woman, you who have not given birth; break into joyful singing and cry aloud, you who have never been in birth labor.
“Make your tent larger and spread your tent curtains farther out, unsparingly;
For you will spread out to the right hand and to the left,
Do not fear for you will not be ashamed, nor be discouraged for you will not be disgraced;
For your Maker is your husband; Yahweh of hosts is his name.
For Yahweh has called you back as a wife abandoned and grieved in spirit,
“For a short time I abandoned you, but with great compassion I will gather you.
In a flood of anger I hid my face from you momentarily;
For this is like the waters of Noah to me:
Though the mountains may fall and the hills be shaken,
Afflicted one, storm-driven and uncomforted one,
I will make your pinnacles of rubies and your gates of sparkling stones,
Then all your children will be taught by Yahweh;
In righteousness you will be established, and you will be far from oppression, for you will not fear; and from terror, for it will not come near to you.
Look, if anyone stirs up trouble, it will not be from me; anyone who stirs up trouble with you will fall in defeat.
See, I have created the craftsman, who blows the burning coals
No weapon that is formed against you will succeed;

v: For the children of the desolate one are more than the children of the married woman,” says Yahweh.
lengthen your ropes and strengthen your stakes.
and your descendants will conquer nations and resettle desolate cities.
you will forget the shame of your youth and the disgrace of your abandonment.
The Holy One of Israel is your Redeemer; he is called the God of the whole earth.
like a woman married young and rejected,” says your God.
but with everlasting covenant faithfulness I will have mercy on you—
says Yahweh, the one who rescues you.
as I swore that the waters of Noah would never again pass over the earth,
so have I sworn that I will not be angry with you or rebuke you.
yet my steadfast love will not turn away from you, nor will my covenant of peace be shaken—
says Yahweh, who has mercy on you.
look, I will set your pavement in turquoise, and lay your foundations with sapphires.
and your outer wall of beautiful stones.
and the peace of your children will be great.
and forges weapons as his work, and I have created the destroyer to destroy.
and you will condemn everyone who accuses you.
This is the heritage of the servants of Yahweh, and their vindication from me—this is Yahweh’s declaration.”
